Gloria,

be very helpful to know their views and reactions shortly —  and we're of course happy to speak with them directly as well 
if that would be helpful. 
EFTA00016239

thanks,

Allred < 
Cc: 
Subject: Cali this week 
Gloria, 
EFTA00016241

Would you have time for a call with the SDNY Epstein team tomorrow or Friday? We would like to provide you with a 
bit of an update and discuss some of your clients in particular. 
Hope you are staying safe and healthy. 
Best, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
I  St. Andrew's Plaza 
New York. NY 10007
